languages.text: {n}Вы выслушиваете доклады офицеров. Благодаря {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Militarum}вашему опыту{/d}, вы легко замечаете изъяны в их тактике и вносите небольшие, но важные изменения. В голосах блюстителей звучит искреннее почтение.{/n}
languages.translation_comment: при посещении церемонии выдаем блюстителям бафф CeremonyMilitarum_buff
при посещении церемонии выдаем блюстителям бафф CeremonyMilitarum_buff

languages.text: {n}You receive the officers' reports. Thanks to your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Militarum}experience{/d}, you quickly discover a number of flaws in their tactics and make a few small but crucial changes. The enforcers respond with deep respect in their voices.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Вы выслушиваете доклады офицеров. Благодаря {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Militarum}вашему опыту{/d}, вы легко замечаете изъяны в их тактике и вносите небольшие, но важные изменения. В голосах блюстителей звучит искреннее почтение.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Du erhältst die Berichte der Offiziere. Dank deiner {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Militarum}Erfahrung{/d} erkennst du rasch einige Schwächen in ihrer Taktik und nimmst einige kleine, aber wichtige Änderungen vor. Die Enforcer antworten mit tiefem Respekt in ihren Stimmen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You receive the officers' reports. Thanks to your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Militarum}experience{/d}, you quickly discover a number of flaws in their tactics and make a few small but crucial changes. The enforcers respond with deep respect in their voices.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Du erhältst die Berichte der Offiziere. Dank deiner {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Militarum}Erfahrung{/d} erkennst du rasch einige Schwächen in ihrer Taktik und nimmst einige kleine, aber wichtige Änderungen vor. Die Enforcer antworten mit tiefem Respekt in ihren Stimmen.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Vous recevez les rapports des officiers. Grâce à votre {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Militarum}expérience{/d}, vous décelez rapidement un certain nombre de failles dans leur stratégie et y apportez quelques modifications mineures, mais néanmoins cruciales. Les prévôts vous répondent d'une voix empreinte d'un profond respect.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You receive the officers' reports. Thanks to your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Militarum}experience{/d}, you quickly discover a number of flaws in their tactics and make a few small but crucial changes. The enforcers respond with deep respect in their voices.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Vous recevez les rapports des officiers. Grâce à votre {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Militarum}expérience{/d}, vous décelez rapidement un certain nombre de failles dans leur stratégie et y apportez quelques modifications mineures, mais néanmoins cruciales. Les prévôts vous répondent d'une voix empreinte d'un profond respect.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Recibes los informes de los oficiales. Gracias a tu {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Militarum}experiencia{/d}, logras descubrir una serie de errores en sus tácticas y aplicas unos cambios tan pequeños como cruciales. Cuando el personal de seguridad responde, el profundo respeto de su voz es inconfundible.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You receive the officers' reports. Thanks to your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Militarum}experience{/d}, you quickly discover a number of flaws in their tactics and make a few small but crucial changes. The enforcers respond with deep respect in their voices.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Recibes los informes de los oficiales. Gracias a tu {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Militarum}experiencia{/d}, logras descubrir una serie de errores en sus tácticas y aplicas unos cambios tan pequeños como cruciales. Cuando el personal de seguridad responde, el profundo respeto de su voz es inconfundible.{/n}

languages.text: {n}あなたは士官から報告書を受け取る。培ってきた{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Militarum}経験{/d}により、すぐに戦術の欠点をいくつも見出し、些細ながらも重要な変更を加えていく。応えるエンフォーサーたちの声からは、深い尊敬の念が聞き取れた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You receive the officers' reports. Thanks to your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Militarum}experience{/d}, you quickly discover a number of flaws in their tactics and make a few small but crucial changes. The enforcers respond with deep respect in their voices.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}あなたは士官から報告書を受け取る。培ってきた{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Militarum}経験{/d}により、すぐに戦術の欠点をいくつも見出し、些細ながらも重要な変更を加えていく。応えるエンフォーサーたちの声からは、深い尊敬の念が聞き取れた。{/n}

languages.text: {n}你收到了军官的报告。在你这个{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Militarum}经验{/d}丰富的战术专家眼中，执法者战术方面的缺陷非常明显。你做出了不起眼但非常重要的改动，执法者的答复声中充满了深切的敬意。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You receive the officers' reports. Thanks to your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Militarum}experience{/d}, you quickly discover a number of flaws in their tactics and make a few small but crucial changes. The enforcers respond with deep respect in their voices.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你收到了军官的报告。在你这个{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Militarum}经验{/d}丰富的战术专家严重，执法者战术方面的缺陷非常明显。你做出了不起眼但非常重要的改动，执法者的答复声中充满了深切的敬意。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Subayların raporlarını alıyorsun. {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Militarum}Deneyimin{/d} sayesinde taktiklerindeki birkaç kusuru hemen fark edip ufak ama elzem değişiklikler yapıyorsun. İnfazcılar, seslerine hâkim olan yoğun bir hürmet hissiyle cevap veriyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You receive the officers' reports. Thanks to your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Militarum}experience{/d}, you quickly discover a number of flaws in their tactics and make a few small but crucial changes. The enforcers respond with deep respect in their voices.{/n}
